events.message: I just received my order, but the product is damaged and has multiple scratches all over its surface.
The reported problem involves visible damage and scratches, so the case is categorized as Product Defect.
The support ticket has been assigned to an agent specialized in handling product defect cases.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the damage to your product. I’m here to help resolve this issue.
Could you please send us some photos of the scratches and the damaged areas? This will help us process your case more quickly.
I have attached the photos showing the scratches and damage on the product. It looks like it was mishandled during shipping.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement product or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would like to receive a replacement if possible, as I still want to use this product but in good condition.
We have arranged for a replacement to be sent immediately, and you will receive tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement product and that everything is satisfactory with it.
Yes, the replacement arrived in perfect condition, and I am very happy with the prompt resolution. Thank you!
We have now closed your case as resolved. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
